item.title: About Bryce Fryer
item.description: Work History Snapchat - Software Engineer Seattle WA. Dec 2021 - Current Worked on the advertiser payments team to build systems that accurately and reliably collected 98% of company revenue. Utilized Google Cloud Platform AppEngine, Datastore, BigQuery and Cloud Tasks to build simple efficient systems. Onboarded to the team quickly and built an advertising billing model and payment method to be offered in 3 new countries while collaborating with front end teams, multiple project managers and the taxes team after being part of the team for less than a year.
